player

Class Player

  • Object
    • Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AI, Human

    public abstract class Player
extends Object
    The Player class's role is to deal with inputs that will feed the game. They can be from the user(Human) or auto-generated(AI). The Player is a parent class for both Human and AI.
    Author:
    Xavier.Lamourec
